overview: On a ranch in rural Montana, Rory and his fellow ranch hands are constantly bullied and humiliated by their cruel foreman, Shep. After a night on the town opens Rory's eyes, he hatches a plan to turn the tables on Shep and gain the upper hand.
tagline: Payday...112Â° in the Shade...and the GAGE MEN are coming to town-IT'S GONNA BE SOME WEEKEND!
title: Heatstroke
